Package ca.concordia.mapworks

Class MapEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.mapworks.MapEditor
  • public class MapEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class to do all the things required for map-editing. Since this is a singleton design pattern, only one instance of this class would be running at a time.

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap​(java.io.File p_MapPath)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Save a map to a text file exactly as edited using domination game map format. and automatically validates map before saving ..
        Parameters:
        p_MapPath - value which is passed as parameter is the file path and is an object of class File
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error is found, it will throw an error of InputOutput type

      • editMap

        public void editMap​(java.io.File p_MapPath)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Load a map from an existing domination map file, or create a new map from scratch if the file does not exist.

        and automatically validates map upon loading

        Parameters:
        p_MapPath - value which is passed as parameter is the file path and is an object of class File
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - inputOutput exception

      • validateMap

        public boolean validateMap()
        Helper method to validate map. it is being called after reading and before writing a map as well as through "validatemap" command
        Returns:
        ValidateMap(getCurrentMap ())

      • resetCurrentMap

        public void resetCurrentMap()
        private method to reset the currentmap into an empty map
